tag.name: ending
tag.description: This is a container tag to house meta-like tags relating to how endings of anime play out.

tag.name: ending tags that need merging
tag.description: See also: http://anidb.net/post426253 [http://anidb.net/post426253] and http://anidb.net/c6774745 [http://anidb.net/c6774745]

tag.name: body and host
tag.description: When a foreign entity like that of a symbiote, body snatcher, puppeteer parasite, or even a hacker (when regarding machines like robots and computers) enters/outright hijacks a body, the possessed subject becomes what is usually called: the host. The basic purpose of the host varies on what the point was for it to have been hijacked in the first place. Sometimes it`s used as a disguise, other times it`s used as a decoy and destraction, even simply being used as a weapon and piece of armor that the possessor uses to cause sheer chaos and destruction, but sometimes... a host can be used for fetish fuel.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Lenalee Lee
character.description: Lenalee Lee is a 16-year-old Exorcist from Hong Kong and member of the http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch] of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. Her parents were killed by an Akuma when she was very young, and she was forced to become an Exorcist as a child. Because she was separated from her brother http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui], her only remaining family member, she repeatedly tried to escape and was restrained. This caused her to hate the Order and Innocence. When Komui joined the Order to be with her, she stopped trying to escape. She now fights for her brother as well as her friends, as she now knows she has a home and family to return to. Her perception of the "world" consists of her friends and family; whenever one of her friends dies, it seems to her as if a part of her world has been destroyed. The Dark Boots, her Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon, take the form of a pair of black, knee-high boots that give her the ability to run at high speeds, jump to great heights, walk on water, create whirlwinds and use sound waves as footholds. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Allen Walker
character.description: Allen Walker is a soft-spoken and warm-hearted 15-year-old Exorcist of British origin and the main protagonist of the series. Allen was abandoned by his biological parents because of the paralysis and supposed "deformity" of his left arm and at age seven was adopted by http://anidb.net/ch32514 [Mana Walker]. Three years later, Mana died and Allen turned him into an Akuma, hoping him to be fully resurrected. Instead, he cursed Allen and sliced through his left eye, giving him the ability to detect disguised Akuma. It was at this same moment that Allen`s left arm first awoke as an anti-Akuma weapon and instinctively destroyed the Akuma. He was later found by http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian] and trained as his disciple until he was sent to the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]`s http://anidb.net/ch32499 [Headquarters] five years later to officially become an Exorcist. His Parasitic-type anti-Akuma weapon goes through two different forms resembling giant arms until it reaches its true form, the Crown Clown, which takes the form of a type of fur cape and a giant claw. Later on, it is able to additionally produce a large sword from Allen`s left arm, resembling the sword the http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Earl] uses. Shortly after his anti-Akuma weapon takes the form of the Crown Clown, his synchronization rate exceeded the percentage required for General level. When the Crown Clown was created, Allen claimed his right hand was for the human race and his left for the Akuma. Recently, allegations have arisen against Allen by http://anidb.net/ch32795 [Malcolm C. Lvellie] concerning recent suspicions that he may possess the implanted memories of the http://anidb.net/ch84636 [14th Noah]. These accusations are further exacerbated when Allen, upon impaling himself with the Crown Clown, experiences severe pain, and starts to awaken the 14th Noah`s memories; he later bears a scar from this injury. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Lavi
character.description: Lavi is a cheerful 18-year-old red-haired Exorcist of mixed heritage. He aims to become a Bookman, a person who records the hidden history of the world, and has been trained from a young age to achieve that goal. He travels extensively with the http://anidb.net/ch7367 [Bookman Senior], archiving various instances of history from a supposedly non-interferative standpoint. He is later shown to possess heightened combat and intuitive skills, and extremely photographic memorization abilities. Lavi is the 49th alias he assumed after casting away his real name to reach that goal. He works alongside the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] just to be close to the events that must be seen, but slowly becomes more attached to his friends in Black Order, and his original Bookman self is constantly being clouded by his growing care for them. His Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon, Iron Hammer, often referred to as "Big Hammer, Little Hammer", is capable of growing and extending to undefined sizes and lengths. The weapon allows him to use "Seals" that control several elements of nature. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Komui Lee
character.description: Brother of Exorcist Lenalee Lee, also the Department Head and Supervisor of the Black Order`s London branch.

character.name: Kanda Yuu
character.description: Kanda Yuu is an Exorcist and member of the http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch] of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], formerly of the http://anidb.net/ch32500 [Asian Branch]. He is a Second Exorcist, an Exorcist raised in a test tube and artificially modified to bear the Innocence of the previous Exorcist his brain formerly belonged to. He is also the second incarnation of the http://anidb.net/ch84613 [lover] of fellow Second Exorcist http://anidb.net/ch81263 [Alma Karma]`s http://anidb.net/ch84614 [former incarnation]. Mugen, his Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon, is a sword with supernatural powers. The shape of the sword has changed throughout the story: during his childhood, it takes the form of a small butcher blade with multiple small wings on the hilt; upon Kanda`s introduction in the beginning of the series, it took the form of a chokuto with a black cross-emblazoned hilt and sheath; after his battle with http://anidb.net/ch9411 [Skin Boric], it was reforged into a traditional http://anidb.net/t1640 [katana]. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Bookman
character.description: Teacher of Lavi, Bookman Senior follows the same `code` as his apprentice, travelling to record history from a neutral standpoint. Uses the Equipmanet-type Innocence Heaven`s Compass, which is a scroll filled with needles that pierce enemies.

character.name: Miranda Lotto
character.description: Miranda Lotto is a 25-year-old German woman whose clock caused time to rewind in her town after she unknowingly activated the Innocence inside it. She often feels inferior and useless and has been fired from over a hundred jobs. This contributes to her chronic depression. With the help of http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen] and http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee], she became determined to become a useful Exorcist one day. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Aleister Crowley Sansei
character.description: Romanian Exorcist, thought by locals to be a vampire. Uses a parasitic-type Innocence that remains nameless, in the form of his own teeth. He can gain a large increase in speed and strength by ingesting the blood of Akuma.

character.name: Tyki Mikk
character.description: Portuguese Noah, inherited and embodies the Pleasure of Noah. Often referred to as the youngest despite his age, he possesses two distinct halves, one of which employs itself as a travelling coal miner in the company of a small group of humans he calls friends. Is somehow related to Rhode Camelot and Sheryl(Ceril) Camelot, as she calls him `Uncle` and Sheryl has addressed him as `Little Brother`

character.name: Road Kamelot
character.description: Road Kamelot represents the "Dreams" of Noah. Despite her early teens appearance, she is referred to as "oldest" Noah or the "First Child". She is also the adopted daughter of Cyril Kamelot and his wife and niece of Tyki Mikk.

character.name: Cross Marian
character.description: Cross Marian is an Exorcist and General of the religious organization, the Black Order. He is the master of Allen Walker, and one of the only people who knew of Mana Walker`s true intentions concerning the boy. He can be very demanding, disrespectful, and temperamental. However, despite his flaws, he shows that he does have a softer side, though it`s usually only seen with Allen or women, like Anita and Lenalee. The latter even managing to keep him from running away from The Order again.

character.name: Skin Boric
character.description: Skinn Bolic was the eighth disciple of the Noah Family, and his Noah name is Raasura. He represents the "Wrath" of Noah. He is currently deceased, but Wrath is said to be reincarnated within another human. He is also known as "Sweet Tooth" by Tyki Mikk due to his extreme love for sweets.

character.name: Sennen Hakushaku
character.description: The Millenium Earl is the First Disciple of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah Family], and is truly named Adam. He is the story`s main antagonist. The Earl resembles a grotesque caricature of a Victorian gentleman: a rotund figure in cape and top hat, with a perpetual enormous grin, a pair of pince-nez spectacles, and horns hidden under the hat. Despite his intentions he often displays a cheerful attitude, but is quick to reveal his more intimidating and malicious side. He is often seeing holding a small living being known as http://anidb.net/ch32940 [Lero] as a regular umbrella, but is also seen using it to summon Akuma. He has a sword, nearly identical to http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker]`s sword of exorcism which amazes him when the two briefly clash in Noah`s Ark. He distributes playing cards with the details of people he wants killed to his collaborators also containing Cell Roron who is the keeper of the list. He has existed for 7000 years. He tricks people who mourn for their dead friends or relatives into resurrecting them, turning them into http://anidb.net/t6684 [Akuma], weapons that consume people`s bodies and follow all his orders. The only person known to have escaped this fate is a child name http://anidb.net/ch83367 [Allen Walker], who destroyed the Akuma of his guardian, http://anidb.net/ch32514 [Mana Walker], before it had a chance to take over his body. In the series` beginning, the Earl attempts to kill a young boy whose best friend was killed by his late mother`s Akuma, but is stopped by http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]. Afterwards, the Earl orders his followers, the Noah Family, to kill all of the Generals of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], an organization of exorcists opposing them. This starts another fight against his enemies, the Black Orders` supporting exorcists. Upon learning that one of them, http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee Lee], might have the Innocence known as the Heart that might give them victory to either side, the Earl traps a group of them into a dimension known as the Noah`s Ark. However, the Ark starts being destroyed, and the Earl escapes the area with Noah http://anidb.net/ch7370 [Tyki Mikk] who was about to be killed by the General http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian]. Shortly afterwards, the Earl orders the Noah to send multiple http://anidb.net/ch32723 [Level 3 Akuma] to attack the Black Order`s http://anidb.net/ch32499 [Headquarters] and kill all exorcists. As the exorcists manage to defeat the invaders, the Earl reminisces about why he did not kill Allen in their first meeting and curses himself for it. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Noa no Ichizoku
character.description: The Noah Family consists of thirteen human descendants of Noah who have inherited his genes. A Noah can be identified by a gray skin tone, yellow/gold eyes, and a horizontal line of seven cross-shaped stigmata referred to as holy marks. Like http://anidb.net/t6684 [Akuma] creatures, they base their powers off dark matter, the opposite of Innocence, and as such are vulnerable to Innocence. The Noah share an inborn drive to kill Exorcists, but otherwise possess unique will and mindsets. "Carved" on their genes is a memory of Noah different from any member in their generation and possess a supernatural ability. They claim to be immortal, but this is proven to be an exaggeration after Yu Kanda kills the Noah Skin Bolic.

character.name: Moor Hesse
character.description: Moor Hesse is a policewoman and a minor character who first appeared in the first chapter and episode of the series.

character.name: Charles
character.description: Charles is the partner of the police officer http://anidb.net/ch32492 [Moor], he was killed by an Akuma during a patrolling in the church to see if it`s not cursed. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Reever Wenhamm
character.description: Reever Wenhamm is the current Chief of the European Branch Science Division Section One.

character.name: Kuro no Kyoudan
character.description: Kuro no Kyoudan is a religious organization that works to defeat the Millennium Earl and his army of Akuma.

character.name: Honbu
character.description: The European Branch (or simply Headquarters), located in England, is one of the seven branches of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] and is the main branch, overseen by Branch Chief and Chief Officer http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee] and his sister, Chief Assistant http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee Lee]. Recently, Lenalee was replaced as the Chief Assistant by http://anidb.net/ch83417 [Bridget Faye]. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Asia Shibu
character.description: Ajia shibu, located in China, is one of the seven branches of the Black Order, overseen by Branch Chief Bak Chang and Chief Assistant Sammo Han Won.

character.name: Hokubei Honbu
character.description: The North American Branch, located in the United States, is one of the seven branches of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], overseen by http://anidb.net/ch84693 [Renny Epstain]. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Central
character.description: A facility located in the Vatican, Central acts as the liaison between His Holiness The Pope and the Black Order. Central is said to have ties with the Great Generals, though the extent of this relationship is unknown.

character.name: Johnny Gill
character.description: Johnny Gill is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] and a scientist in the http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch]`s Science Division. He is often identified by the black skull on his shirt and his big glasses. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Tap Todd
character.description: Tap Dop is a member of the Science Department of the Black Order.

character.name: 65 Gou
character.description: 65 Gou, or Rokujugo, is a mechanical creature made by the European Branch Science Division of the Black Order.

character.name: Hevlaska
character.description: Hevlaska is an Exorcist of the http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch] of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. Holder of The Cube that holds the instructions written by those who made Innocence, she has been acting as the Black Order`s prophet and keeper of the shards of Innocence for about one hundred years. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Jeryy
character.description: Jeryy is dark skinned and wears a sleeveless chef`s overall. His hair is black (purple in the anime) and set into very finely kept braids. he also is always seen wearing sunglasses despite the fact he works indoors.

character.name: Toma
character.description: Toma is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], where he acts as a Finder, a regular human unit with no special powers who travels the world investigating unusual phenomena that could be linked to Innocence. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Buzz
character.description: Buzz is a Finder that is stationed at Headquarters. He and other Finders were performing a memorial service to their fallen comrades, right behind where Kanda was eating. When Kanda expressed his loss of appetite, Buzz demanded an apology. However, Kanda beat him up and began strangling him. Allen then stepped in to stop the whole charade. He is a tall, burly man with many markings on his face and a bald head. Despite his appearance, he appears to be sensitive about his fallen colleagues. He appeared in the Leaf of Revival arc.

character.name: Lara
character.description: A doll in the ruin city of Mater, Italy. She continued moving for 500 years after the city fell. She is attached to Guzol, as he was the only human to accept her for what she is.

character.name: Guzol
character.description: Guzol is the human companion of the doll http://anidb.net/ch32510 [Lara]. He was the only human citizen of Mater in the city`s later years. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Pierrot
character.description: Pierrot is the first Level 2 Akuma to appear that originally appeared as a Level 1 in Mater, where it attempted to steal the http://anidb.net/ch32510 [Ghost of Mater]`s Innocence. Once it had evolved into a Level 2, Pierrot gained the ability to physicially mimic other living beings and even inanimate objects like sand. He called this ability a Paper Mirror, as he was also able to take off his skin and superimpose it onto others to disguise them however he wanted. Pierrot`s ability, however, had shortcomings: all of his copies were exact mirror images, and despite being able to copy http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]`s Cross, he could not copy its strength. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Mana Walker
character.description: Mana Walker is the adoptive father of http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker], and the older brother of the http://anidb.net/ch84636 [14th Noah].

character.name: Jake Russell
character.description: Jake Russell is a scientist and a member of thehttp://anidb.net/ch32498 [ Black Order]. He`s also http://anidb.net/ch32516 [Jean]`s father. He appeared for the first time when http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen] came to him in order to ask him to stop his son, Jean, from patrolling the city, looking for Akuma. Later on, he was seen by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee] while talking to http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee]. Komui immediately suspected that they started dating, even more when he found out that they took the same day off. The truth was that they were helping each other choose a present for Komui, in Lenalee`s case, and Jean, in Russell`s.

character.name: Jean
character.description: Jean is a minor character and friend of Leo, a young man who was turned into an Akuma when he tried to bring his mother back to life. After helping Jean realize Leo`s true nature, http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker] exorcised Leo at Jean`s insistence.

character.name: Lulu Bell
character.description: Lulu Bell is the Twelfth Disciple of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah Family], representing the Lust of Noah and is truly named Lustul. When she is in her Noah form, her hair is black, as is typical of the Noah. Lulu Bell possesses the ability of "Form", allowing her to change her body into anything she wishes, including liquids, animals, or the appearance of others. She often appears as a cat with a pale stigmata on its forehead. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Akuma Level 4
character.description: Level 4 is the most powerful and destructive Akuma known to the Exorcists so far, surpassing even the strength of the Noahs. Despite its immense strength, like all other levels of Akuma, the Level 4 still has to obey the Noah clan, though they no longer have to obey the Skulls, unlike the Level 3.

character.name: Chomesuke
character.description: Chomesuke was a modified Level 2 Akuma that worked for General Cross Marian after he refined her. Her human form is a woman named Sachiko.

character.name: Eliade
character.description: Eliade was a Level 2 Akuma sent by the Millennium Earl to spy on Arystar Krory III.

character.name: Eshi
character.description: Eshi the first Level 3 Akuma shown in the series and one of the few Akuma to be given a name.

character.name: Ice
character.description: Ice is a Level 2 Akuma who attempted to help http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Road Kamelot] locate http://anidb.net/ch7368 [Miranda Lotto]`s Innocence. Ice stands on two bulky, arm-like appendages and has no body below his torso, a key occupying the space where his legs should be. He has long hair with some pulled into a curled ponytail on the top of his head, and a wide smile filled with crooked teeth. When his powers a fully released, his "Ice Fire" makes his entire body burst into flames. Like all Akuma, Ice is bloodthirsty, but he is also shown to be a little simpleminded, playing "Rock, Paper, Scissors" with his comrades to decide how to kill http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]. He was shown to be terrified when Road gave him the order to self-destruct, though he obeyed anyway, having no choice. As he died, his soul reached out to Allen, begging for help. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Kazekiri
character.description: Kazekiri is a Level 2 Akuma who attempted to help http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Road Kamelot] locate http://anidb.net/ch7368 [Miranda Lotto]`s Innocence. Kazekiri has a pendulum-like body with a handle-shaped upper torso. His `arms` are protruding blades that he can bend at will and spin rapidly in order to stay airborne. Like his fellows, http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Ice] and http://anidb.net/ch86421 [Pang], Kazekiri is shown to be bloodthirsty but simpleminded, seen playing a game of "Rock, Paper, Scissors" in the middle of a fight to decide how to kill http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker]. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Mimi
character.description: Mimi was http://anidb.net/ch32720 [Lulu Bell]`s faithful Akuma. While her spirit was that of a servant, her body was that of a princess. It made her existence as Lulu Bell`s maid/manicurist somewhat ironic. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Sophia
character.description: Sophia is a young girl living in Daukern, Germany, with her sister http://anidb.net/ch86416 [Angela] and their http://anidb.net/ch86417 [father]. Her sister was ill, so Sophia found a job in the nearby town of Mittelwald to pay for her medicine. However, once Sophia left, Angela was cast into the role of the village witch, and forced to live alone in the witch`s cabin. She fell into a coma and died. Sophia came back and was devastated to find her sister dead. The http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Millennium Earl], sensing her sadness, came once she called her sister back. He brought her back as an Akuma and made Angela kill her and take her body. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Anita
character.description: Anita is the owner of a large brothel in Guangzhou, China which had been secretly supporting The Black Order since the time of her mother. Like her mother before her, she has deep feelings for Cross Marian. Both supported The Order because they wanted to do something for him. Cross has stated that Anita was a good woman.

character.name: Bak Chang
character.description: Bak Chang is a 29-year-old Chinese descendant of a German wizard who was one of the founders of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. He is also the leader of the Black Order`s http://anidb.net/ch32500 [Asia Branch], a post also previously occupied by his great-grandfather. Like http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui], he is a man completely aware of his duties and will follow God`s will strictly. He is able to use spells that control the structure of the building because of his great-grandfather`s seal and his bloodline. Acting as the director of the branch, he is a cold and very responsible leader. However, he is actually very caring toward others. He has a stalker-like infatuation on http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee], as seen by a folder of photos of her he carries everywhere with him. He also has a close relationship with http://anidb.net/ch32781 [For]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Chaozii Han
character.description: Chaoji Han is a 20 year-old crew-member of a ship helping the Exorcists to Japan and is one of surviving shipmates after the ship is lost to sea after an Akuma attack. He was raised by http://anidb.net/ch32776 [Anita], a supporter of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order], after his mother was killed by an Akuma and he becomes extremely loyal to Anita and the crew of her ship; he develops an extreme hatred of all Noah and Akuma even after their deaths, going so far as to accuse http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen] of being evil for sparing the life of http://anidb.net/ch7370 [Tyki Mikk]. He is later discovered to be an Accommodator, and he happily becomes an Exorcist under http://anidb.net/ch32784 [General Tiedoll] to avenge those he lost at the hands of the http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Earl]. His Equipment-type anti-Akuma, the Arm of Baptism, grants him superhuman strength. It appears as a pair of gloves with buttons on each knuckle and cloth-like extensions at the wrists. When revoked, it takes the form of two linked bracelets on his left wrist. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Daisya Barry
character.description: Daisya Barry is a 19-year-old Exorcist from Bodrum and a member of thehttp://anidb.net/ch32498 [ Black Order]`s http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch]. Daisya was a student of General http://anidb.net/ch32784 [Froi Tiedoll] who found Daisya in his hometown. Daisya was rebellious and rude as a child and fervently denied all interest in being an Exorcist. After his town was attacked by Akuma and he saw how cool General Tiedoll looked, he decided he would like to try and left home. Before he left, he used his soccer ball to kick down the doorbell his family used at their shop, saying it was the only thing in that house he was fond of besides his deadbeat father, nagging mother, two annoying brothers, and his crybaby sister. Daisya, http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda], and http://anidb.net/ch32930 [Marie] were sent to Barcelona, where General Tiedoll said he would be. Unfortunately for him, Daisya ran into http://anidb.net/ch7370 [Tyki Mikk] who killed him and destroyed his Innocence. The Charity Bell, his Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon, hangs at the tip of his hat. When activated, it takes the form of a hollow ball which he can kick around. When the ball goes inside an Akuma`s body, it makes a ringing bell-like sound, which destroys the Akuma. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Foo
character.description: Foo is a the guardian deity of the Black Order`s Asian Branch.

character.name: Froi Tiedoll
character.description: Froi Tiedoll is a former artist who is loyal to his work and fatherly towards his disciples. He is the General in charge of http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda], http://anidb.net/ch32930 [Marie], http://anidb.net/ch32779 [Chaozii], and http://anidb.net/ch32780 [Daisya]. He is often seen sketching and drawing the nature. He was devastated when his apprentice, Daisya died. The Maker of Eden, his Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon, takes the form of a crucifix and a rod, and a spiritual chisel. The crucifix drives the chisel into the ground, creating doll-like creatures. Another ability of his Innocence is to create an orb-like light around Tiedoll that destroys any http://anidb.net/t6684 [Akuma] it comes into contact with. He can also create a large forest of thorns to defend people, known as the Embracing Garden. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Fuchou
character.description: The Head Nurse, is a member of the European Branch of the Black Order and is the most prominent member of the medical ward in the series.

character.name: Howard Link
character.description: Howard Link is a subordinate of http://anidb.net/ch32502 [Central] Inspector http://anidb.net/ch32795 [Malcolm C. Lvellie]. A former member of http://anidb.net/ch84585 [CROW], he was assigned to act as http://anidb.net/ch84637 [Allen Walker]`s observer/guardian after Allen fell under suspicion for being connected to http://anidb.net/ch84602 [the 14th Noah]. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Kevin Yeegar
character.description: Kevin Yeegar was the oldest of the Generals. Being a former school teacher, he felt compassionate for those that followed under him. However, it also gives him painful memories of his life as a teacher. In one incident, one of his student was killed in an accident. This causes another student to grieve for her, however turning her into an http://anidb.net/t6684 [Akuma]. As he wasn`t an Exorcist then, he could not kill the Akuma, which led to a massacre of all his students. He became an Exorcist in the wake of this incident. Later, he was attacked then crucified facing the cross by http://anidb.net/ch7370 [Tyki Mikk], dying shortly after the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] recovered his body. Yeegar`s Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon is a pair of chained pendulums that can split into multiple smaller pendulums, allowing him to attack many Akuma at once. His Innocence was eventually destroyed by the http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Millennium Earl]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Kie
character.description: Kie is one of three surviving crew members of http://anidb.net/ch32776 [Anita]`s ship after it was attacked by http://anidb.net/t6684 [Akuma] at sea. He joined the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] as Finder afterwards.

character.name: Klaud Nine
character.description: Klaud Nine is the only female General. Formerly an animal trainer in a circus, she seems to be a kind and gentle woman, as she is seen weeping for Sol Galen, Tina Spark, and Gwen Frere who were killed searching for her. She has long blond hair, and a scar on the right side of her face. She is later the General in charge of http://anidb.net/ch82893 [Timothy Hearst]. Lau Shimin, her Parasite-type anti-Akuma weapon, takes the form of a little monkey, usually seen riding on her shoulder. It is the first sentient Innocence shown in the series. When invoked, it transforms into a monster that attacks with balls of energy that form at its fists. It is also able to attack in long distances.

character.name: Mahoja
character.description: Mahoja is a loyal servant of Anita. She is also a supporter of the Black Order. She`s shown to be very strong and will protect Anita from even an Akuma. She to, along with Anita and the rest of the crew exept three, were killed on the way to Edo.

character.name: Malcolm C. Lvellie
character.description: Malcolm C. Lvellie is a high-ranking Inspector of of the Central Agency, a subsection of the Vatican that oversees the Black Order.

character.name: Suman Dark
character.description: Suman Dark is an exorcist of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]`s http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch]. He joined the Black Order in order to pay for his daughter`s medical fees. In fact, he had such a great love for his family that he begged http://anidb.net/ch7370 [Tyki Mikk] to spare him so he could live to see them again. However, in exchange, he had to give information about the Order, which turned him into a Fallen One. As Suman did not want to be part of the Black Order in the first place, he was quite lonely during his employment, with the exception of making friends with http://anidb.net/ch32503 [Johnny Gill], whom he played chess with. Usually, Johnny wins, and Suman would refuse to talk with Johnny, and sulk all the time until after a mission, to which Suman would ask for a rematch. Suman has a Parasite-type anti-Akuma weapon, which takes the form of a gem-like stone near his thumb. He is able to manipulate the wind. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Winters Socalo
character.description: Winters Socalo is an Exorcist General of the Black Order.

character.name: Jamie Dark
character.description: Jamie Dark is the daughter of Suman Dark.

character.name: Rohfa
character.description: Rohfa is a member of the Black Order`s Science Division in the Asian Branch.

character.name: Timcanpy
character.description: Timcanpy is a modified golem that is passed down to http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker] from General http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian]. It follows Allen (or http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee] when Allen is not with him) around, and can often be found resting on Allen`s head or shoulders. He has the ability to record the events that occur around him and then play them back, and is able to rebuild himself when he is crushed or destroyed. It is revealed later that Timcanpy also contains the piano score for the http://anidb.net/ch84636 [14th], and has been owned by http://anidb.net/ch84602 [Nea Walker]. Unlike most other golems, which are mechanical, Timcanpy seems to be a biological being, though what his body is made up of is unclear as he has been seen being reduced to fragments with no discernible organs. He also has a mouth, teeth and tongue. Its size also differs. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Sheril Kamelot
character.description: Sheril Kamelot is the Fourth Disciple of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah Family], representing the "Desire" of Noah and is truly named Desires. He is the adoptive father of http://anidb.net/ch82914 [Road Kamelot] and the elder brother of http://anidb.net/ch84615 [Tyki Mikk]. His power seems to be a form of telekinesis, as he is seen crushing his target`s limbs without touching them, and manipulating the movements of the Science Department team. He is also seen to manipulate objects, as he did with the pipes that bound http://anidb.net/ch81263 [Alma Karma]. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: CROW
character.description: CROW, the Central Office Battle Corps, is an elite group of humans from http://anidb.net/ch32502 [Central] who act as special enforcers. Though they are not endowed with Innocence, they possess unique skills and the ability to cast powerful spells to bind their enemies. Regular members of CROW are capable of temporarily hindering Akuma and preventing Exorcists from using their Innocence. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: The 14th
character.description: The 14th Noah was the extra member of the http://anidb.net/ch10022 [Noah Family]. He was the only member, other than http://anidb.net/ch82914 [Road] and the http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Earl], who was able to control the Ark. Before the story`s timeline, he gave this power away to a human and ran, betraying the Earl and the Clan of Noah. He attempted to kill the Earl in order to become the new Earl himself, but was killed in return by the Earl, an ending which greatly depressed the Earl. Later, it was revealed that the 14th had chosen http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen Walker] as his next host. Some time before his death, he told http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian] that if http://anidb.net/ch83365 [Mana] was looked after, he would return to him one day. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Renny Epstein
character.description: Renny Epstain is a member of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order] and the Chief of the http://anidb.net/ch32501 [North American Branch].

character.name: Komlin II
character.description: Built by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui] with the intention of it lightening the workload of the Science Division, Komlin 2 was fully capable of performing surgery and repair work to anti-Akuma weaponry. Komui, though, programmed it to share his intelligence level and personality, resulting in it apparently sharing his love of coffee. It drank Komui`s coffee and went insane, first attempting to make http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Lenalee Lee] more masculine. When Komui told the robot that http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]`s Innocence was damaged, it made Allen its top priority and trapped it in the surgery room built into its hull. Lenalee then regained consciousness and kicked the robot (as well as her brother when he tried to defend it), making it explode. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Komlin I
character.description: The first Komlin robot http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee] made was destroyed by http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda Yuu] because it supposedly ate his soba. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Komlin III
character.description: Komlin III was the third robot made and piloted by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee], in his attempt to destroy http://anidb.net/ch32515 [Russell] when he believed that Russell and his sister were dating. It ended up leveling part of the town and, ultimately, got kicked and destroyed by http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee]. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Komlin IV
character.description: Komlin IV was another giant robot made by http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui Lee] that attacked http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen], http://anidb.net/ch7369 [Krory] and http://anidb.net/ch7363 [Lavi] when the Gatekeeper perceived Krory as an Akuma. It made Lavi into an omelet, and dumped salt and oil on Allen and Krory. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Miranda Lotto
character.description: Miranda Lotto is a 25-year-old German Exorcist and member of http://anidb.net/ch32499 [European Branch] of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. She accepted the offer to become an Exorcist after the incident in the rewinding town, but unfortunately, she was separated from her Finder on their way to the Black Order. After all incidents she got herself into, she somehow managed to reach the Headquarters and was last seen praying to http://anidb.net/ch7365 [Komui ]to not have her clock cut apart, as she treasured it dearly. After http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]`s Innocence was damaged to the point where his status as an Exorcist was suspended, the rest of General http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian]`s search party was unable to continue on their way to Edo, since http://anidb.net/ch32776 [Anita]`s ship was severely damaged. At that point, the newly arrived Sammo Han Won announced that Miranda will be joining their group, and that she will be able to help them continue on their way. The Time Record, her Equipment-type anti-Akuma weapon, is located on her right arm. It allows her to stop or reverse time in an area for a short while, causing any object to revert to its original status. However, any damage the object suffered before and during the reversed time will affect the object once the technique is stopped. She is also unable to resurrect the dead, due to the fact that her Innocence can not erase time. She used her Time Record to repair Anita`s ship for use, but when she sees the shocked reactions of those around her, she feared she overstepped her boundaries and threw herself into the ocean to atone. Once she had been fished out of the ocean and the group took off on Anita`s ship, Miranda joined the other Exorcists in the captain`s cabin and gave them their new uniforms, sent directly from the European Branch to provide them with better protection.

character.name: Aleister Crowley Sansei (Kodomo Jidai)
character.description: For his entire life, Krory lived in a secluded castle. In his childhood he grew up with his Grandfather among a huge collection of foreign artifacts. Prized among these were rare carnivorous plants that would attack if they sensed aggression. Due to the castle they lived in and the plants` tendency to attack any guests, rumors began to spread in the nearby village that the inhabitants were Vampires. Shunned by the village and left in isolation, Krory began to feel as if he was just another piece in his grandfather`s collection. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Vittorio
character.description: Vittorio is extremely strong warrior from Ancient Rome who was designated to fight for the princess of his kingdom, Sandra. He fought endlessly for her sake in constant fear that if he were to lose a single fight, the princess would have to marry the winner. He was eventually chosen by a fragment of Innocence one thousand years ago due to his prayer of not wanting to lose the princess at a temple, leading to his title "The Millennium Swordsman". Vittorio refused to fight any woman who tried to fight him. Because of this, http://anidb.net/ch7123 [Lenalee] couldn`t help http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda] and http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]. The Innocence he carried allowed him to remain ageless over hundreds of years and kept him from noticing that the kingdom and princess he had sworn to protect have already disappeared a long time ago. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Gozu
character.description: Gozu is a finder of the http://anidb.net/ch32498 [Black Order]. He is very fearful, and kind at heart, seeing that he cried over a http://anidb.net/ch32760 [witch]`s death. Gozu is almost killed by Akuma and he is saved by http://anidb.net/ch7366 [Kanda]. They then go to investigate in Daukern about the witch and the forest where she resides. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki, edited.

character.name: Angela
character.description: Angela grew up with her http://anidb.net/ch32760 [sister] and http://anidb.net/ch86417 [father] in the Daukern village. She was ill so her sister found a job in the nearby town of Mittelwald to pay for her medicine. However, once she left, Angela was cast into the role of the village witch and forced to live alone in the witch`s cabin. She fell into a coma and died. Sophia came back and was devastated to find her sister dead. The http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Millennium Earl] came to Sophia once she called her sister back. He brought her back as an Akuma and made her kill her sister and take her body.

character.name: Pang
character.description: Pang is a Level 2 Akuma who attempted to help http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Road Kamelot] locate http://anidb.net/ch7368 [Miranda Lotto]`s Innocence. Pang has four heads and five faces, counting the Level 1 Akuma face, and bracers on his wrists. He also seems to be wearing vertically striped trousers. Like all sentient Akuma, Pang enjoys killing. He is also a little simpleminded, shown playing a game of "Rock, Paper, Scissors" with http://anidb.net/ch32757 [Ice] and http://anidb.net/ch32758 [Kazekiri] to decide who would kill http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen], and then shown getting mad when Allen attacked them while they were playing. Source: D.Gray-man Wiki

character.name: Tyki Mikk
character.description: Tyki Mikk, after http://anidb.net/ch7347 [Allen]`s failed attempt to exorcise the Noah inside him. Tyki is fully awaken as a Noah, turns into a demonic knight and easily beats both Allen and http://anidb.net/ch7363 [Lavi]. They`ve managed to hold on until http://anidb.net/ch9409 [Cross Marian] entered the scene and confronted him instead. Just when Cross Marian was about to land the final blow, Tyki was saved by the http://anidb.net/ch9471 [Millennium Earl].

episode.title: アクマを狩る少年
The Boy Who Hunts Akuma
Le jeune chasseur d`Akuma
O Garoto Que Caça Akumas!
หนุ่มน้อยนักล่าปีศาจ
Akuma o Karu Shounen
episode.summary: Evil is spreading across the globe, and young exorcist Allen Walker is humanity’s greatest hope to survive the gathering storm. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒の教団
The Black Order
La Congrégation de l`Ombre
Organização Da Religião Negra!
ศาสนจักรแห่งความมืด
Kuro no Kyodan
episode.summary: After a difficult journey, Allen reaches Black Order headquarters, but the scar above his left eye doesn’t prompt anyone to roll out the red carpet. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マテールの亡霊
The Ghost of Mater
Le fantôme de Matera
O Fantasma De Matel!
วิญญาณแห่งมาเทล
Mater no Bourei
episode.summary: Allen sets out to recover Innocence discovered in southern Italy. When a powerful Akuma attacks him, the exorcist comes face to face with something eerily familiar. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 土翁と空夜のアリア
Old Man of the Soil and a Lonely Night`s Aria
Le vieil homme et l`aria d`une nuit triste
O Velho Homem Da Terra E Aria Do Céu Noturno!
ชายชราแห่งผืนดินกับบทเพลงแห่งผืนฟ้ายามค่ำคืน
Tsuchi Okina to Kuuya no Aria
episode.summary: An evolved Akuma - the most powerful foe Allen has ever encountered - turns the exorcist’s own powers against him in a battle that can only end in self-destruction. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 子守唄を聞かせて
Let Me Hear the Lullaby
Chante-moi une berceuse !
Deixe-me Ouvir Uma Canção!
ขับกล่อมบทเพลง
Komoriuta o Kikasete
episode.summary: When an Akuma destroys a sentimental moment between the Ghost of Mater and her longtime companion, painful memories wash over Allen, and a ferocious rage erupts from him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 災いを呼ぶもの
That Which Calls Forth Disaster
Celui qui apporte le malheur
ผู้เรียกหาความวินาศ
Wazawai o Yobu Mono
episode.summary: A daring attempt to save a little boy brings Allen face to face with the Millennium Earl! The two old foes play catch-up amidst a hail of poisoned Akuma bullets! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 記憶の墓標
Tombstone of Memories
Le tombeau des souvenirs
สุสานแห่งความทรงจำ
Kioku no Bohyou
episode.summary: Abandoned by his parents due to his gruesomely deformed left arm, Allen is left completely alone in the world until kindly Mana takes pity on him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 黒の教団壊滅事件!?
The Black Order Annihilation Incident
La destruction de la Congrégation de l`Ombre ?!
คดีถล่มศาสนจักรแห่งความมืด
Kuro no Kyoudan Kaimetsu Jiken!?
episode.summary: Allen still feels like a stranger at Black Order headquarters, and the young exorcist just can’t shake the feeling that he is being kept in the dark about certain happenings. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 巻き戻しの街
The Rewinding Town
La ville à rebours !
เมืองแห่งการหวนกลับ
Makimodoshi no Machi
episode.summary: Allen and Lenalee investigate a town where time repeats, but a gang of Akuma is hell-bent on making sure they recover the missing Innocence before the exorcists do. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 不幸な女のイノセンス
The Bad Luck Woman`s Innocence
l`Innocence de la malchanceuse
อินโนเซนส์ของสาวอับโชค
Fukou na Onna no Innocence
episode.summary: Allen and Lenalee must recover the lost Innocence and destroy the dream from which Miranda cannot wake. Standing in their paths is a devious adversary descended from an ancient lineage. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ミランダ・ロットーの思い
Miranda Lotto`s Feelings
Les sentiments de Miranda Lotto
ความรู้สึกของมิลันด้า ลอตโต้
Miranda Lotto no Omoi
episode.summary: Road Kamelot has arrived to stop Allen and Lenalee from recovering the Innocence and halting the cruel cycle of repetition plaguing the town. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: そして街に雪が降り...
And Snow Falls over the Town
Et la neige tomba sur la ville...
และแล้วหิมะก็โปรยปราย
Soshite Machi ni Yuki ga Furi...
episode.summary: Road reveals something about the Millennium Earl’s grand scheme while battling the exorcists. Can Miranda harness her bizarre powers in time to save her new friends? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 団服(コート)と共に
With the Coat
Avec l`uniforme !
ก้าวไปพร้อมกับเสื้อโค้ท
Coat to Tomo ni
episode.summary: After his showdown with Road, Allen’s left eye is badly wounded. Until it heals, he’ll be unable to distinguish between Akuma and the humans whose identities they assume. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 復活の葉
The Leaf of Revival
L`Arbre de la Résurrection
ใบไม้แห่งการคืนชีพ
Fukkatsu no Ha
